task_1.justification: Anti-bribery certification required for contracts over $10,000 (Section 1 of regulations.pdf).

non_compliant_terms: Payment terms 'Net 45' violate Regulation PT-2019 (max 30 days).
$100 holiday gift violates Clause 2.1 (no pre-approval for gifts >$50).
Blank Material Origin violates Regulation ES-2021 (requires disclosure).
corrective_action: Remove gift or seek Legal pre-approval.
Add country of origin for all materials.

legal_risks: Clause 4.2: Ambiguous delivery timelines may lead to vendor delays.
Clause 7.1: Indefinite confidentiality is unenforceable in most jurisdictions.
mitigation_strategy: Specify exact delivery deadlines in Clause 4.2.
Limit confidentiality to 5 years in Clause 7.1.
